author: dimitry8570
content:
Yes its a real tool that can be used for other dev purposes as well. Such as transaction execution and debug. 

No, retesteth cmd interface is different to t8ntool, it manages test generation and execution.  T8ntool just takes files with data and output result

If other clients implement t8ntool, retesteth can be used to generate tests using their evm

author: dimitry8570
content:
Its 2 different formats. BC means blockchain. That is used by hive to run in blackbox for all the clients that does not support tests.

State test format is simplier and used by custom test runner tools by all the teams.

author: dimitry8570
content: To run tests faster retesteth attempt to create intermediate communication files (inputs for t8ntool) on memory drive. Check that you have reserved some space for shm
